He noted the need for two different sized rods and will order the … More Response from the owner a month ago Thank you for your wonderful feedback! We're delighted to hear that you had a positive experience with our custom valances and found our team’s professionalism to be top-notch throughout the process.

Amy and Vincent made the process of adding new roller shades to my entire house very easy, and the end result turned out even better than I had hoped! Amy was amazing at making suggestions and helping me understand my own design style better. Installation was quick and easy. Response from the owner a month ago Thank you for sharing your experience with our team! We're thrilled to hear that our roller shades have enhanced your home and that the process was seamless and enjoyable for you.
